question: who sings so come and dance with me jai ho
api_result: The song "Jai Ho" is performed by the Indian musician A.R. Rahman, and it features vocals by Sukhwinder Singh, Tanvi Shah, Mahalakshmi Iyer, and Vijay Prakash. This song became particularly famous after being featured in the movie "Slumdog Millionaire" (2008). The lyrics "come and dance with me" are part of the chorus in the English version of the song, which was popularized globally.
